casebody.data:
City of Stamford v. Local 2657, Council 4, AFSCME (4354)

Dupont, C. J., Hull and Spallone, Js.

Argued June 6 decided July 8, 1986 Deborah M. Steeves, assistant corporation counsel, with whom, on the brief, was Jay H. Sandak, corporation counsel, for the appellant (plaintiff). J. William Gagne, Jr., with whom, on the brief, was Barbara J. Collins, for the appellee (defendant). Per Curiam.

There is no error.
